info.title: Ubiqod by Skiply
info.description: Ubiqod provides a simple and powerful platform to connect your Skiply IoT buttons and Qods to third party platforms. This connector triggers a flow every time data is sent by any of the IoT-devices or Qods belonging to the configured group.

delete.description: Delete the routing of data to the trigger.

parameters.name: routingId
parameters.description: The routingId is the unique identifier of the routing in the DB.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Content-Type specifies that the data is sent in json format.

device_name.description: Identifier of the Qod or IoT-device (s/n)
device_name.title: Identifier

device_label.description: Label of the Qod or IoT-device.
device_label.title: Qod or IoT-device label

request_date.description: Datetime of Qod scanning or IoT-device message transmission.
request_date.title: Timestamp

button_label.description: Code label or raw value if no such code defined in the related code list (button index for IoT-devices if no such code defined).
button_label.title: Action value

times_button_pressed.description: Only for IoT-devices, number of times the button was pressed
times_button_pressed.title: Number of presses

site_id.description: Site ID the Qod or IoT-device is linked to.
site_id.title: Site Id

site_label.description: Site name the Qod or IoT-device is linked to.
site_label.title: Site label

badge.description: 1 if condition is valid, 0 if not - For IoT-device: condition is valid when magnetic badge has been swiped / For S-Qod: condition is valid when dynamic QR code has been scanned from the device and validated by the Ubiqod server.
badge.title: On-device condition

customer_contact_email.description: Email of customer contact defined on Site.
customer_contact_email.title: Customer contact email

customer_contact_phone.description: Phone number of customer contact defined on Site.
customer_contact_phone.title: Customer contact phone

site_manager_email.description: Email of site manager defined on Site.
site_manager_email.title: Site manager email

site_manager_phone.description: Phone number of site manager defined on Site.
site_manager_phone.title: Site manager phone

gps_condition.description: 1 if condition is valid, 0 if not - condition is valid when the user GPS position is under the validation distance from the site position, 0 if not or if the user refused to give its position.
gps_condition.title: GPS condition

code_condition.description: 1 if condition is valid, 0 if not - condition is valid when the entered code is defined in the related code list.
code_condition.title: Code condition

gps_value.description: If available, GPS coordinates of the user's position.
gps_value.title: GPS value

validation_code_value.description: If available, validation code label or raw value if no such code defined in the related code list.
validation_code_value.title: Validation code value

custom_field_1.description: Only for Qod with a form, value of field #1.
custom_field_1.title: Custom field 1

custom_field_2.description: Only for Qod with a form, value of field #2.
custom_field_2.title: Custom field 2

custom_field_3.description: Only for Qod with a form, value of field #3.
custom_field_3.title: Custom field 3

custom_field_4.description: Only for Qod with a form, value of field #4.
custom_field_4.title: Custom field 4

post.summary: When data is received from IoT-device or Qod
post.description: This operation triggers when one of the IoT-devices or Qods in the target group sends data.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: This parameter is used by Ubiqod to determine the origin of the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Content-Type specifies that the data is sent on json format.

group_id.description: Name of the Ubiqod group you want to link to this trigger.
group_id.title: Group Name

hookUrl.description: URL of the webhook where we will post data.
hookUrl.title: Webhook URL

id.description: ID of the group in the Ubiqod account.
id.title: Group ID

group_name.description: Name of the group in the Ubiqod account.
group_name.title: Group Name
